text: Pray for me / I ’ m about to hit the ‘ Ye button I don ’ t wan na say nothin ’ wrong / But it ’ d be wrong if I ain ’ t say nothin ’ Imagine if I ain ’ t say somethin ’ / Wouldn ’ t none of these niggas say nothin ’? — Kanye West, “ Champions ” Is there a such thing as bad press? This month, Kanye West – undeniably one of the most famous, successful, critic - proof hip - hop artists in history – went on what can best be described as a “ negative press tour. ” His baffling series of public provocations were, at best, a Gabbo - style alienation of his massive fan base.
